word:
Blessings Withheld Because Men Fail. It is because men have failed to copy the life of Christ that the great Head of the church has been restrained from bestowing His blessings largely. For such men cannot be used by the heavenly agencies in transforming the world to Christ's divine image.-- 


                                     -359- 

Manuscript 25, 1899, p. 9. ("Faithfulness in the Work of God," March 12, 1899.)
